headline: How New Leadership And Gold’s Rally At Newmont (NEM) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent days, Newmont began 2026 under new leadership as President and COO Natascha Viljoen stepped into the CEO role on January 1, while the company’s shares moved alongside a renewed rally in gold prices that has lifted precious metals miners broadly. This combination of firmer gold prices and a leadership transition puts fresh attention on how Newmont balances operational execution, capital allocation, and longer-term growth plans. We’ll now consider how Newmont’s leadership change...

headline: United States Metals & Mining Industry Report 2025, Profiles of Freeport-McMoRan, Newmont, Nucor, Peabody Energy
summary: The U.S. metals and mining industry offers opportunities through its diverse segments, including aluminum, steel, and precious metals, despite recent production volume declines.
